name: Gold-Price
author: Infinity Softech

sections.description:
Establishing a global price per gram of Gold, Silver, and Platinum and utilizing the weight of each product, the price can be automatically calculated based on this rate, making the pricing process more efficient and accurate for all Woo-Commerce simple products and variable products.

  • Establishing a global price per 1 gram of Gold, Silver, and Platinum: This involves determining a consistent price for each gram of these metals across the world, which can be used as a reference rate for calculating the price of products that contain these metals.
  • Setting up the rate for each metal: This means determining the price for one gram of Gold, Silver, and Platinum based on factors like market demand, supply, and other economic factors that influence the price of these metals. Once these rates are established, they can be used as a reference rate for calculating the price of products containing these metals.
  • Utilizing the weight of each product: The weight of a product plays a significant role in determining its price. By utilizing the weight of each product, the global rate per gram of the respective metal can be applied to automatically calculate the price of the product.
  • Automatic price calculation: With the global price per gram of Gold, Silver, and Platinum established and the weight of the product identified, the price can be automatically calculated based on this rate. This eliminates the need for manual calculations and ensures that pricing is consistent across products.
  • Compatibility with Woo-Commerce simple products and variable products: This process can be applied to both simple products (products with fixed weights) and variable products (products with different weights or sizes). This makes the pricing process more efficient and accurate for all products sold on the Woo-Commerce platform.

Key Features

  • Establishing a global price per gram of Gold, Silver, and Platinum
  • Utilizing the weight of each product
  • Automatic price calculation based on the established rate
  • Improved efficiency and accuracy in the pricing process
  • Applicable to all Woo-Commerce simple products and variable products

Support

If you require assistance with customizations or wish to hire a developer,
please feel free to contact me via email at kavavimal@gmail.com or info@infinitysoftech.co
sections.installation:
Installation Via WordPress Admin Area

  1. Log into your WordPress admin area.
  2. Go to Dashboard » Plugin.
  3. Click on Add New Plugin button at top.
  4. Search for “Gold Price Based on Weight”.
  5. Now click on “Install Now” button of the “Gold Price Based on Weight” plugin.
  6. Click on Activate once the plugin is installed.

Installation Using FTP

  1. Download the ‘gold-price-based-on-weight.zip’ file.
  2. Extract Zip file.
  3. Using your FTP program, upload the non-zipped plugin folder into the “/wp-content/plugins/” folder.
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

sections.reviews:
This plugin satisfies my needs.

By arjunangts on December 1, 2023

With this plugin, I am incredibly delighted that all of the functionality are present and function well. This performance led me to decide to buy a premium plugin.

Amazing Support, Help, Proffesionalism

By deanjoseph2039 on August 8, 2023

I do not think I can fully express the amazing service, support received from this amazing team when using the plugin. The plugin is of so much help and the way it works is fantastic and exactly what was needed. At all times they were available to assist, help and go above and beyond. I can truly say that they really care and want to supply their customers only the best. Thank you for your amazing plugin and the customer support that you provide.

excellent support

By srinagesh17 on March 2, 2023

I am delighted to share my experience with this plugin and the exceptional support team behind it. The plugin is undoubtedly a great addition to my Website where we sell gold, and I have been impressed with its performance and features.

What stood out to me was the excellent support provided by the team when I reached out for a customization. They were quick to respond and went above and beyond to help me achieve my desired outcome. Their level of expertise and professionalism were exemplary, and I couldn't be more satisfied with the service I received.

As a user, it is reassuring to know that the team behind the plugin is committed to providing top-notch support and is always willing to help their users achieve their goals.

I would highly recommend this plugin to anyone looking for a reliable tool with exceptional customer support. It is evident that the team behind this plugin cares about their users and is dedicated to providing the best possible experience. Thank you for your outstanding service and support!

Exactly what I needed!!

By sharkbyte (deenafsm) on February 27, 2023

I needed a plugin that would allow me to add a global price per 1 gram of gold and then just use the product weight to calculate the price automatically. Works exactly as expected, no issues at all. I reached out to the developer as I needed help with having this work with variable products and he customized the plugin to work as I needed. Super fast and amazing support, will be working with him on other custom plugins! Thanks again!

Simply & Effectiv

By sushanthreddy on December 29, 2021

Working with this plugin is very easy and user-friendly. A plugin that works simply and Effectively, If you are going to run a jewelry store it is very useful to maintain the price of gold, silver, platinum easily with woocommerce. Thank you for developing such a plugin for free.

Good plugin

By legalaffair on November 22, 2021

I was searching for a similar plugin but was not able to find a free version.. this plugin does the job if your going to sell gold jewellery

Simple & Awesome plugin!!

By Zeboto (zeboto) on October 28, 2021

Plugin works fine. Need more customization option like 1grm price, product making price field.
